description:
The Coast XT is Oru Kayak's most sophisticated kayak. Designed for week-long adventures in open water, 180L of storage carries everything you need for a comfortable trip. The 16-foot length features a flat hull that glides effectively and quickly. Cockpit adjustability, adjustable backrest and footrest plus ability to add a sprayskirt let you go out when the weather is far from perfect. Once you're done, fold it back and slide it under your bed, put it in the closet, or keep it in your van for impromptu paddling.

  • Foldable polypropylene construction withstands being folded and unfolded thousands of times
  • Hull shape creates a stable and maneuverable kayak that tracks straight
  • Bulkheads (non-waterproof) accommodate airbags, providing added buoyancy for rescue scenarios
  • Cargo space of up to 180L and a carrying capacity of up to 400lbs
  • Adjustable footrest and backrest
  • Folds down to a portable, stowable box
  • Box dimensions: 83 x 74 x 30cm
  • Cockpit accommodates paddlers up to 198cm in height
  • Sets up tool-free in minutes
  • Spray-skirt compatible
name: Oru Kayaks Coast XT Folding Kayak
